Package Controller

Class MovieDatabaseController

Object
MovieDatabaseController
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatabaseController
public class MovieDatabaseController extends Object implements DatabaseController
MovieDatabaseController is a controller that is used to write and read from the movie text file.
Since:
2022-11-03
Version:
1.0
Author:
Koh Ming En
